title: WITS Attacks in Afghanistan, April - end of June, 2009
name: WITS Attacks in Afghanistan, April - end of June, 2009
description: Worldwide incidents tracking system results for all attacks in Afghanistan from the beginning of April until the end of June. Location names were pulled out from the original text, and geocoded at either the City district, or province level. IED attacks were flagged separately, 1 = IED attack, and 0 = Not an IED attack.
